bill.title: University of Hawaii; Special Funds; Revolving Funds
bill.description: Converts certain revolving funds of the University of Hawaii into special funds. Repeals certain funds of the University of Hawaii and transfers the remaining balances to specified alternate funds. (SD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to HED, FIN, referral sheet 3
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HED on Thursday, 02-10-11 2:00PM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, Nakashima, Aquino, Awana, Belatti, Hanohano, Mizuno, Saiki, Takai, Takumi, Wooley, Ching, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Chang.
(H) Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 358) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Chong, Nakashima excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-24-11 12:30PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Coffman.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 748) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-11.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 309).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to EDU, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on EDU has scheduled a public hearing on 03-21-11 1:30PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on EDU recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in EDU were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi.
(S) Reported from EDU (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 920) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-30-11 9:30AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1167) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-12-11.

(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Solomon . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Taniguchi). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 576) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 573).
(H) House conferees appointed: Nishimoto, Tokioka Co-Chairs; Chong, Johanson.
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 584).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Tokuda, Chair; Ige, Co-Chair(s); Taniguchi.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 644).
(S) Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-11 2:30PM in conference room 329.
(S) Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-26-11 1:30PM in conference room 329.
(S) Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-28-11 2:30PM in conference room 329.
(S) Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-29-11 2:00PM in conference room 329.
Carried over to 2012 Regular Session.
